Command.Name: launch
Command.Help: Starts the mission immedeatly.

Command.Name: stop
Command.Help: Stops the mission immedeatly.

Command.Name: drop
Command.Help: Starts the mission immedeatly, but only when all players are ready and the weight difference is smaller or equal to maxdiff (in tons). Syntax is '-drop [max. weight diff].'

Command.Name: cold-drop
Command.Help: Starts the mission immedeatly, but only when all players are ready and the weight difference is smaller or equal to maxdiff (in tons) Also ensures frags are set and the server gets locked. Syntax is '-drop [max. weight diff]? [no. of waves]?'.

Command.Name: help
Command.Help: Haha. Funny!

Command.Name: commands
Command.Help: Shows a list of available commands.

Command.Name: list-players
Command.Help: Shows a short info about players. Syntax is '-list-players [search term]?'. The search term is optional. If ommitted lists all players.

Command.Name: list-maps
Command.Help: Shows a list of available maps or players. Syntax is '-list maps [search term]?'. The search term is optional. If ommitted lists all maps.

Command.Name: map
Command.Help: Selects a map. Syntax is '-map [search term]'. The search must lead to a unique result or be exactly equiv. to a map name.

Command.Name: restart
Command.Help: Restarts the server, taking config changes per -config into account.

Command.Name: shutdown
Command.Help: Shuts the server down.

Command.Name: hello
Command.Help: Makes the bot say hi.

Command.Name: version
Command.Help: Prints the bot version number.

Command.Name: balance
Command.Help: Prints a small overview of team weights and mechs.

Command.Name: admin
Command.Help: Grants or revokes admin status to a player. Syntax is '-admin [playername] (off|on)'.

Command.Name: login
Command.Help: logs the player in as admin, if the token is valid.Syntax is '-login [token]'.

Command.Name: webshell
Command.Help: Shows the IP where to access the webshell.

Command.Name: vote
Command.Help: Starts a vote to execute a admin command.

Command.Name: visibility
Command.Help: Sets the visibility. Syntax is '-visibility (default|clear|lightfog|heavyfog)'.

Command.Name: weather
Command.Help: Sets the weather. Syntax is '-weather (on|off)'.

Command.Name: daylight
Command.Help: Sets day or night. Syntax is '-daylight (on|off)'.

Command.Name: time
Command.Help: Sets the time for map. Syntax is '-time [no. of mintes]'.

Command.Name: frags
Command.Help: Sets the frag limit. Syntax is '-frags [no. of lives per wave]'. Using a value of zero deactivates frags.

Command.Name: waves
Command.Help: Sets the waves limit. Syntax is '-waves [no. of waves]'. Using a value of zero deactivates waves.

Command.Name: radar
Command.Help: Sets the radar. Syntax is '-radar (advanced|simple|team|off)'.

Command.Name: lock
Command.Help: (Un)locks the game. Syntax is '-lock (on|off)'.

Command.Name: stock
Command.Help: Enforces stock configs. Syntax is '-stock (on|off)'.

Command.Name: bots
Command.Help: (De)activates bots the game. Syntax is '-bots [no. of bots]'. Using a value of zero deactivates bots.

Command.Name: kick
Command.Help: Kicks the specified player. Syntax is '-kick [player name]'. Using a value of zero deactivates bots.

Command.Name: ban
Command.Help: Kicks the specified player. Syntax is '-kick [player name]'. Using a value of zero deactivates bots.

Command.Name: comstar
Command.Help: Looks in the ComStar Data for a term and prints information about it. Syntax is '-comstar [search term]'.
